title.@value: Recurrent transverse myelitis aquaporin-4 antibody positive

definition.@value: Two or more episodes of transverse myelitis which is typically longitudinally extensive (>3 vertebral segments) associated with seropositivity for aquaporin-4 antibodies but without sufficient features to fulfill the 2006 NMO diagnostic criteria.

label.@value: Recurrent transverse myelitis aquaporin-4 antibody positive
